resources.string: Please select the service and name of the salon and leave your feedback below

\t\t\t Each woman be afraid of changing especially if this changing related to her beauty, because of that we aim to decrease this fear via building an application that helps woman to choose the most suitable haircut depending on \t her face shape.
In this application we aim to help women to choose the most suitable haircut depending on their face shape.
\t\t Services: \n \t 1-Choose Haircut. \n\t 2-Reservation for hair cutting ,in addition to the possibility of evaluating the service provided by the salon
